dc:title: On Pilgrimage - September 1948
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Opposes registration for conscription and describes their picketing a sign-up site. Notes how easily pickets become violent and her loathing of the use of force. Updates on construction projects and retreat work at Maryfarm.
